group_1.textLeft: Everyone! I'm glad you're safe!

group_1.textRight: What happened to you guys?

group_1.textLeft: It's a long story, but...

group_1.textRight: ...You mean, we're in the Labyrinth of an@invisible Witch...
And the dreams we all had,
were caused by the wish of this person@named Manatsu.
Who was the girl who became that Witch?

group_1.textLeft: I think there's plenty of proof.
Four out of the six of us here have already@had our dreams come true.
...And so...
I would like to help fulfill Manatsu's wish.

group_1.textRight: She's been forgotten by everyone...and turned@into a Witch...
At the very least, we can help make her wish@a reality.
...But, is that really okay?
Right now, the Witch isn't attacking us thanks@to the wish, but...
After it comes true...

group_1.textLeft: ...After it comes true, we will need to defeat@the Witch, yes.

group_1.textRight: You sure you can do it?

group_1.textLeft: ...Yes, I've steeled myself.

group_1.textRight: It's gonna be a tough fight...but I sure want@to help make her wish come true.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you.
But what do we have to do...?

group_1.textRight: Homura acted on the clue her prophetic@dream gave her.

group_1.textLeft: And Nagisa's SOS message was just a typo@she made while sending it.

group_1.textRight: Which means it's gonna come true, no matter@how it plays out!

group_1.textLeft: The remaining premonitory dreams are Kyoko's,@and mine...

group_1.textRight: The miracle a Magical Girl wishes for is@bound to come true.
It's not a question of whether or not it@will happen.
What we need to do is make sure nobody@gets hurt along the way.

group_1.textLeft: I'd like someone to keep an eye on Manatsu's@family.
Nagisa, go play with Manatsu's little sister@some more.
If anything happens, we'll need you to act@as her shield.

group_1.textRight: Will do!

group_1.textLeft: Us too!

group_1.textRight: We can't rely on Nagisa alone.

group_1.textLeft: Then I'll leave it to you.

group_1.textRight: Kyoko, while you still have the opportunity,
why don't you visit the candy store you've been@looking forward to?

group_1.textLeft: I could accompany you for a bit.

group_1.textRight: Sure ya don't wanna keep an eye on the family?

group_1.textLeft: There's still a long way to go.@It's not good to get too entangled.
I had a dream about fireworks at night.

group_1.textRight: ...So this is gonna last until after dark.

group_1.textLeft: I wouldn't worry about it.
We have four juniors we can rely on.
